Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, H. Rept. 95-1107.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide the conveyance of title and ownership to 2.58 acres within the Bridger-Teton National Forest, Wyoming, to Ben Boschetto, Jr.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey at fair market value to a certain individual ownership and title to a specified number of acres within a certain national forest.

titles.title: A bill to provide the conveyance of title and ownership to 2.58 acres within the Bridger-Teton National Forest, Wyoming, to Ben Boschetto, Jr.
